name: Login page on desktop emulation device

nodes.name: Check layout: specs/loginPage.gspec included tags: desktop

specs.name: inside screen -1 to 1 px bottom
errors: "footer" is 35px bottom which is not in range of -1 to 1px

sections.name: &skeleton_elements are aligned vertically above each other
A page should be centered horizontally inside screen with 900px on desktop, but on mobile and tablet it should stretch to screen
every &skeleton_element is centered horizontally inside screen

specs.name: text is "Sample Website for Galen Framework"

sections.name: every &menu_item is inside menu and has height ~ 64px
first &menu_item is inside menu 0px top left
&menu_items are aligned horizontally next to each other
every &menu_item is aligned horizontally all menu

specGroups.name: located at the top inside content with 20 to 45px margin

sections.name: &login_box_elements should be more or less readable
login_button should look like a primary button
cancel_button should look like a secondary button
&login_box_form_elements are aligned vertically above each other with 5 to 20px margin
&login_box_buttons are aligned horizontally next to each other with 0 to 5px margin

nodes.name: Type "qweqwe" to username on Login page
Check layout: specs/loginPage-withErrorMessage.gspec included tags: desktop

sections.name: password_textfield, error_message are aligned vertically above each other with 5 to 30px margin
